scripts.start: npm run sync:env && npm run sync:backend-front && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start
scripts.android: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js auto && npm run sync:backend-front && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --android --host lan
scripts.android:emulator: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js 10.0.2.2 && npm run sync:backend-front && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --android
scripts.ios: npm run sync:env && npm run sync:backend-front && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --ios
scripts.web: npm run sync:env && npm run sync:backend-front && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --web
scripts.start:web:localhost: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js localhost && node ./scripts/sync-backend-frontend-url.js localhost 8081 8082 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --web
scripts.start:web:lan: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js 192.168.1.100 && node ./scripts/sync-backend-frontend-url.js 192.168.1.100 8081 8082 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --web
scripts.start:lan: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js 192.168.1.100 && node ./scripts/sync-backend-frontend-url.js 192.168.1.100 8081 8082 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start
scripts.start:auto: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js auto && node ./scripts/sync-backend-frontend-url.js auto 8081 8082 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --host lan
scripts.start:auto:web: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js auto && node ./scripts/sync-backend-frontend-url.js auto 8081 8082 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --web --host lan
scripts.start:tunnel: node ./scripts/sync-backend-env.js auto && node ./scripts/sync-backend-frontend-url.js auto 8081 8082 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 expo start --tunnel
scripts.release:tag: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8'));console.log('v'+pkg.version);" | git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") -m 'Release v'$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push --tags
